description: DeploymentConfigStatus represents the current deployment state.

availableReplicas.description: AvailableReplicas is the total number of available pods targeted by this deployment config.

conditions.description: Conditions represents the latest available observations of a deployment config's current state.

details.description: Details are the reasons for the update to this deployment config. This could be based on a change made by the user or caused by an automatic trigger

latestVersion.description: LatestVersion is used to determine whether the current deployment associated with a deployment config is out of sync.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the most recent generation observed by the deployment config controller.

readyReplicas.description: Total number of ready pods targeted by this deployment.

replicas.description: Replicas is the total number of pods targeted by this deployment config.

unavailableReplicas.description: UnavailableReplicas is the total number of unavailable pods targeted by this deployment config.

updatedReplicas.description: UpdatedReplicas is the total number of non-terminated pods targeted by this deployment config that have the desired template spec.
